titleStmt.title: Saint George, and the dragon, Anglice, Mercurius Poeticus: To the tune of, The old souldjour of the Queens, &c.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "News, news: - Here's the occurrences: and a new Mercurius ..."
Cf. Wing S309A which has periods after the words "Dragon" and "Anglice".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
